text: The Sun Also Rises is a 1957 American drama movie directed by Henry King and based on the novel of the same name by Ernest Hemingway. It stars Tyrone Power, Ava Gardner, Mel Ferrer, Errol Flynn, Eddie Albert, Henry Daniell, Juliette Gr√©co and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: The Sun Also Rises (1957 movie)
